categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Timi Rotramel was a male Mon Calamari Senator who represented the planet Dac and Calamari sector in the Imperial Senate during the Galactic Civil War.

Rotramel's representation ended before the Senate's dissolution in 0 BBY, when Mon Calamari was enslaved by the Galactic Empire, Timi was among those who joined the Rebellion against the corrupt government.

He attempted to recruit President Si-Di-Ri of Tiss'sharl to the Rebel Alliance through speaking of the recent Alliance victory at Yavin and a possible base on the planet but was interrupted by, and after struggling to fire a pull-out blaster at, then killed midway by the Sith Lord Darth Vader.
